page.title: 06FAMILY LIFE
page.content: My family's surname is Egerton. My Dad is an engineer at the local hospital which is in Chichester. My mum also works at the hospital, she is a nurse. I have a brother who is called Jason. Both me and my brother are adopted. I live in a house that has three bedrooms. My bedroom is the smallest. My parents are still paying for the house. My house is in Deeside Avenue. My brother goes to the Chichester Boys High School. Usually I get up at 6.30 a.m. and have breakfast at 7.00. I start walking to school at 8.30. I get to school about five minutes later. I get back from school at 4.00 p.m. My favourite sport is cricket. I eat at half-past five. When I have eaten my tea I usually play Football and I sometimes watch television. I usually watch B.B.C. programmes.
